title: Чёрный пёс
overview: The group under the command of Major Andrei Rubtsov is in the Syrian desert. Their task is to capture the arms dealer Greg Brinner, who works for the terrorists. The merchant is captured, but only after the soldiers fly they understand that the captive is not Brinner, but another man banged with a bang. The helicopter falls, all die, with the exception of Rubtov, who, however, loses his memory...
